name: afastidioushat
text: I neglect to realize that I am audiocasting when company is around. I should really look into changing my ways.

name: farqussus
text: Why stand when there's a perfectly good seat?

name: tekende
text:
This and old rules of etiquette (always stand when a lady enters the room, etc.), all point to one fundamental statement about males:

Real men stand at unnecessary times.

name: fermatprime
text: HA ha! Multiple entendre!

name: tekende
text: I made an entendre? Where?

name: fermatprime
text: I - I'm really not sure anymore. I may have been drunk when I made that comment. I apologize.

name: userbeliever
text: could be penis-related joke

name: vulpes-aurum
text: Do you think having alcoholism is rad?

name: farqussus
text: Yes

name: panthera3000
text: I thought it was a harvey birdman reference

name: dj_douche
text: You pee sitting down pass it on

name: farqussus
text: I pee sitting down pass it on

name: picnick
text: I pee while sitting down pass it on

name: selbencoirlo
text: I pee while passing shit down on it

name: techiebabe
text: Wow, the terms and concepts I've missed, having only girl parts my whole life.

name: lugosh
text: That cat sure does like corn...

name: rainwolfj
text: One of my cats will eat corn that enthusiastically... but he'll eat anything he sees me eating the same way...

name: anticitizen
text: That avatar, that comment, and that reply combined with my healthy affinity for this website have all proven to me that my damn cats won't ever do anything cool ever

name: pogo
text: Yeah, that bowl can be quite a good amplifier.  Pissing against the side and not directly into the pool is also much quieter, and minimizes the dried pee splash that decorates most men's bathrooms.

name: superleahjane
text: Cleaning up after yourself also eliminates dried... ahem... elimination

name: beverage
text: I am a man. I will audiocast no matter the audience.  It's much worse if people think you pee sitting down.

name: boredom_man
text: I cover it up with a lusty rendition of "Immigrant Song."

name: jhunter
text: AH-AHHHHH-AH

name: tekende
text: That is a hilarious mental image. Mental video. Thank you.

name: adonkon
text:
Man what's so bad about audiocasting

Why people gotta get all up in arms about the sound of liquid hitting liquid

name: dusty
text: For a moment I thought you meant you were reading this aloud, which would be quite awkward if anyone unfamiliar with the strip were around.

name: havenless
text: I actually felt a twang of disappointment when I entered Ray's urine into wikipedia and didn't find his article

name: fuckyoufriday
text: Well, get to work!

name: jamers
text: Sadly it merely redirects you to Achewood's article.

name: rotating-dog
text: When this first came out, Ray's Urine was a real page, not a redirect. If they have episode summaries of Friends, they can have "Ray's Urine". What the HELL people.

name: lolsworth
text: They even got rid of the redirect at one point, the BASTARDS. I put it back myself.

name: mira
text: Those wikipedia people are very stern about things like this. They take their interneting very serious.

name: rotating-dog
text: We need a victory with Wikipedia.

name: tim_simmons
text: those dudes do not give up easy they will edit and delete until the internet looks like the aftermath of waterloo

name: c_dizzle
text:
Even legitimate things are off limits to them. For some reason the high-schoolers in charge of the chemistry pages won't let me replace 'pleasant' with "OFFENSIVE" odor in the carbon disulfide entry because "I don't have a reference saying it's smelly." What the FUCK, people, I work with it ! GAHD!

I'm sorry. Everyone. No one THERE will listen.

name: dominus101
text:
I spent two weeks trying to edit a reference to Achewood into the Catullus article. Just a "Catullus was mentioned in the webcomic Achewood" with a link to the Catullus strip. I even had it entered in the "Catullus in Popular Culture" section of the article. Those uptight Wiki-dorks deleted it every time.

In the discussion area, they told me to look at the other popular culture entries to see what was "appropriate".

Well fuck you, Wikipedia, for only thinking Operas and the like are appropriate pop culture.

name: hyetal
text:
You pick any ancient Chinese general you want and scroll to the bottom of his Wikipedia page; you'll find a description of his moveset and character profile from the Dynasty Warriors games.

Some part of me felt that this was worth adding.

name: zem
text: ahhahahaha the lists of video game and family guy references at the bottom of most useful pages is one of the things i hate most about wikipedia now i find out it's because of you two clowns

name: killerlimpet
text:
Yeah I keep getting banned for writing "You just lost the game!" as a hidden comment in various pages.

No sense a' humor, the lot of them.

name: homeskool
text: Thanks, now I just lost the damn game.

name: farqussus
text: IF wiki editors had their way Wikipedia would be six hundred pages about Megatokyo.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Hmmm. Redirect to wikipee would be much more apropos.

name: subactuality
text: Every wikipedia editor is Pat.  Every. God. Damned. One.

name: fattybeaver
text: I actually try to "audiocast" louder when company is over in hopes they will subconsciencely think I have a big wang.

name: vreeeee
text: Although it really has more to do with internal pressure; if they stop to think about it at all they will probably just assume you have a small bladder.

name: apocowarg
text: i refuse to sit down when i have company but i do aim the stream for the sides of the bowl where there's no water. it's very effective at noise-dampening but not recommended if you want a clean toilet rim.

name: hastooo
text: A comment left by hastooo was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by straw, apocowarg, riotdejaneiro, sarmatron, NDCaesar, techiebabe, Doc_Rostov)

name: apocowarg
text: Urine drying on the flat surface of a toilet rim is no one's defintion of clean. While the urine hitting the side walls of the toilet does have a minor cleaning effect, the risk of pissing on the rim and floor are greater than if you pissed directly into the water. Given the fact that urine does not always exit the male urethra in an orderly and straightforward fashion this further contributes to a dirty toilet rim. And yes, I am an idiot.

name: iseedeadpixels
text: I flush the toilet and then try to race to see if I can finish peeing before it stops flushing. Regardless of whether or not I have company over.

name: fineoakstructure
text:
Damn so that's what's up with you guys.

That still doesn't explain those people I've come across in public bathrooms: they start flushing the urinals as soon as they start peeing, and continue to do so until done, maybe 3 or 4 times. It bothers me to no fucking end.

name: foetus_punch
text:
Man, what the fuck? Personally, I try and remember to not audiocast, but I then forget, start peeing, feel terrible for the amount of noise I'm making, reach over and try and turn on a faucet, re-direct my stream of pee and end up peeing in the bath tub, freak out because I really wanted to have sex with the person in the other room and there is no way they are going to bone me if they hear how loud I pee and I peed on all their things, accidentally urinate on myself, and start singing the first verse of James Brown's "The Big Payback" acapello while flushing repeatedly to cover up the noise of my continued peeing and also while wiping up the pee.

Well, really, that only happened once. But it stuck in the mind, and to this day I'm really neurotic about peeing.

name: iseedeadpixels
text: This story is reason enough for the need for inbox sorting. A chubby.

name: tekende
text: I really wish I could chubby this again.

name: sock
text: Don't worry. I've got you covered.

name: em2
text: "Get ready, you mutha'!"

name: foetus_punch
text: "I might not know karate, but I know...c-raze!" James Brown is too addicted to all kinds of terrible drugs to finish the word "crazy". Also, at one point, the man screams out "Holocaust!" Truly, one of the great madmen of our time.

name: njury
text: I wish I hadn't run out of chubbies, this is 10 kinds of awesome.

name: karljw
text: i started laughing uproariously at the bathtub part and didn't stop til the end. well done, sir.

name: hastooo
text: A comment left by hastooo was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Mangtastic, NDCaesar, Fermatprime)

name: anzio
text: You are the real deal, jerk face.

name: soticoto
text: I do that all the time anyway. Shooting straight for the water can cause hella splashback... unless you're totally lacking pressure.

name: dumase
text: you know what they say about people with small bladders.

name: quinlaenar
text: That they are usually Charles Bukowski?

name: boredom_man
text: BRING ME YOUR URINE

name: cbtbone
text: Small shoes.

name: smallberries
text: Occasionally when I worked at Broadwing I'd have a reverie in the toilet stall, you know: #2 - when a mystery person would enter the bathroom and make the terrifying noise of a mop bucket being dumped into the urinal. I could never conclude my business rapidly enough to assess the person responsible, or whether an actual bucket was involved. Finally a few months into this mystery, fortune smiled as I was washing my hands. Douchey McDouchekins (a high-level back stabbing douche hated by everyone including his friends) came in and made that terrifying sound, WITH HIS PENIS. To this day I still shudder ...

name: digdugz
text: Really if you had a larger wang it would hang lower and be closer to the toilet bowl, making less noise.

name: hooves
text: oh my god, I do that as well hoping for the same effect. I thought I was the only one.

name: echidnaboy
text: "Y'all take a listen, you'll hear a deep sound comin' down from Bobby Peru."

name: tomsonlocal
text: This strip wins as Ray feels the need to check that no-one is watching him gain a win over a computer in the second panel.

name: cdl146
text: I love the [[untrue?]] notation used. I feel most Wikipedia articles should feature this.

name: gormster
text: They do, except you write {{dubious}}.

name: slalvation
text: But that's lame.

name: jdhenry105
text: "ping"?

name: patkun
text: I assume he wanted to type with the class and integrity of a typewriter, but still be able to delete mistakes, so he ordered  a custom keyboard from Japan that has a sound effect linked to the 'enter' key.

name: the_voice
text: That is astute.

name: cracklewater
text:
There's a Program that allows each and every one of your keystrokes to be a 'tak' while your enter key gets an extra-annoying 'ding' to simulate the carriage return.

Such fun!

A parasitic celebrity who was allowed to share our office space for a (short) while had this charming app installed on his mac. He gave us a full 15 min of typing sounds from his powerbook before he was told to turn it the fuck off.

name: pseudochron
text: This article contains a trivia section, which is discouraged under Wikipedia guidelines. The article could be improved by integrating relevant items into the main text and removing inappropriate items.

name: juanclaudius
text: I hate that rule so much. Trivia sections actually improve some articles.

name: mugi
text: I like them.  Bullet points appeal more to my short attention span than long paragraphs.

name: cailetshadow
text: Notice that there is a photo reference for Ray's urine "casting a pall" over almost any occasion.

name: nigelchaos
text: Good eye. You just made that a 5 for me

name: foetus_punch
text: I noted that, and wondered what on earth it could be. I suspect it occurred near the end of the "Toilet party".

name: molesticide
text: i never audiocast, EVER, even when i am alone.  this is a neurotic hang-up i developed as a child and will probably never be rid of.

name: soticoto
text: Then you are quite clearly not male.

name: achilleselbow
text: Goth boys pee sitting down, pass it on

name: foea
text: Nah, some of us get stage fright. It's a real thing.

name: foetus_punch
text: Yeah, I knew a dude who had serious hang-ups about pissing in a public bathroom when there was a child in it. Me, I can't urinate unless it's directly on a child's face.

name: nielj
text: "Tippa Tappa Tap!" : Mr. T typing.

name: bizarro8mybaby
text: Is it bad that I want to know what Ray's first citation could possibly link to?

name: wingspan
text:
My father never taught me how to shave. He has never given me advice on dealing with women. We never had "the talk". My older brother and his friend taught me to ride a bike. But I'll be damned if dad didn't sit me down one day when I was 8 years old and explain that I should pee against the back of the bowl and not directly into the water.

It was the night of Friday, June 11 1993. I know this because my aunt took me to see Jurassic Park on opening night and urinated loudly while she was in the house, resulting in the discussion with my father.

name: wingspan
text: Oh jesus christ, I urinated loudly while she was in the house.

name: tekende
text: I think I like the other way better.

name: fineoakstructure
text: Agreed.

name: tonyhighwind
text: This strip changed my urinating habits for the better. Dudes, just because we can pee standing up does not mean we should, especially when your aim is hell of terrible. To stay the course in the face of your own poor urinary marksmanship is obstinance of the worst kind.

name: hyetal
text:
To do anything other than pee standing up is to deny reality and attempt to censor life. I'm not going to sit here like a Puritan from the xteenth century and pretend that these Unclean acts aren't happening; noises from peeing are as real as the thousands of children living in Africa today who'll be dead tomorrow, the tortured prisoners in jails across the planet, and the spoiled rotten celebrities who contribute nothing and live in sloth.

TODAY WE STAND AND PISS

TOMORROW THE WORLD

UNITE

name: peng33
text:
Ray was urinating when Reagan was shot? That would make him close to 30 years old... at least.
That is unbelievably old for a cat.
